ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to create a Heatmap with Metadata and shows how it can be used with PaletteProviders, Tooltips and Labels
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to create a Heatmap with Text in the cells SciChart. Accepts a 2D Array of data and has a user-defined colour map which can be displayed as a legend over the chart.
